title: Ahh...
content:
I knew the forum was a bit quiet...

Let's see; when I log in; it is always from my home computer, and thus... I always check 'remember me on this computer', it usually works. I will look into this... and do a test post (yet one that doesn't look like a test).

BTW - Have you contacted Andy?

-- NAJAWA --

Oh My GOSH!!! I CAN'T POST!!!

LL, ty for alerting me; being a good steward of my reputation, I wasn't going to try to post anything new... I guess no one can post... and thus explains why K:M is soooooooooooooooo quiet!!!

I guess only Andy can fix this one

I'll email him, and encourage you all to do so as well.

-- NAJAWA --

Has anyone sent Andy a message? One of us oughtta, but one's enough.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

title: K:M
content:
Okay; I did a test, and here are the results:

Voting: You can still vote in polls
New Topic: Nope
Reply: Nope
Quote: Nope
Edit Post: Nope

Basilcally; anything which requires you to submit something will not work; I get the blank white screen of death!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

SAVE US ANDY!!!

-- NAJAWA --

title: OK, I'll have a look
content:
I'm leaving work early this afternoon anyway -- I'll try to fix it up then. I think I need to update phpbb anyway, so I'll do that first which should fix it.

Thanks for the heads-up, everyone who emailed me! I've been too busy with all sorts of other things to drop by K:M very often, and the PCKF not at all. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

I'll post again here when it's working correctly.

Aw...

So ends opporation 'Spam Andy Till K:M Works!'

Well... go luck, Andy!!!

Please fix it soon; we haven't got all century ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] )

-- NAJAWA --

title: K:M:
content:

Just suggestions

title: Re: K:M:
content:
OK, posting seems to be working again [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

If you find anything that doesn't seem to be working correctly, please email me right away (andy @ durdin . net).

For those interested, it broke when PHP on the server was upgraded from version 5.0.4 -> 5.0.5.

title: Yipee!!!
content:
